name: Metamorphosis (itch) (AlexanderNox)
description:
Metamorphosis - is a project implemented as part of the "Trayektoriya budushchego" Olympiad. The project follows the theme of the task, namely "One tool, many purposes". The theme "One tool, many purposes" is revealed through the mechanics of metamorphosis. Metomorphosis is a universal tool which allows to move, change the size, acceleration and weight of the user of metamorphosis.

WARNING
I find bug with "Contine" button, it doesn't work the first time, but you have to press it more.

Control keys:
W/A/S/D - Movemet
Left mouse button - Metamorphos
R - Reload Level

[FREE] Dark Techno / EBM / Industrial Type Beat 'GREMORY' | Background Music

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9JDXFduYVuk&ab_channel=AimToHeadOfficial
